title: Best of The Herd: 08/14/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/14/2019
description:
Baker Mayfield says he won't change and Colin says that's not only false but actually a bad thing.  He thinks Aaron Rodgers is trying to play the victim in a situation that simply does not have a victim.  Plus, NBC Sunday Night Football Analyst Cris Collinsworth tells Colin why he loves Baker and Gruden's persona is great as long as the Raiders win games 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
